articles.description: Clu Gulager, a prominent actor in classic Westerns, horror films, and other genres in television and film since the 1950s, has died from natural causes surrounded by family at the age of 93.
articles.content:
Clu Gulager, a prominent actor in television and film since the late 1950s, has passed away at the age of 93. 
The talented star had roles in a total of 165 IMDB projects during the course of his ca… [+4598 chars]

articles.title: Fidel Castro's daughter defends casting of James Franco as her father in upcoming biopic - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: Emmy winner John Leguizamo and other Latinx actors have called out Franco's casting as the controversial Cuban leader in the upcoming film, Alina of Cuba.
articles.content:
Fidel Castro's daughter Alina Fernández supports James Franco's casting as her father in the upcoming independent film, Alina of Cuba.
